Review.Titre: Pleased, Surprised and Happy with your exceptional services
Review.Contenu: I have been using your services for years now and we’ve been very pleased! We enjoy our time talking, connection is quick and mostly, the clarity of our calls. I’ve also been pleasantly surprised as I was browsing through the pages to get another access number and came across a huge amount of minutes I had accrued unbeknown to me! I was so excited and pleasantly surprised, because I had no idea I was accruing voice minutes with my purchases. Thank you that was awesomely unexpected and we enjoyed every minute. Again thank you for the wonderful and clear service provided by Telephoneghana. We’ve been truly happy with the connection and clarity of our calls as well as the ability to use my minutes online with KC app. Much appreciated, Jennie😊
